properties.name: width
properties.description: Radius of the sphere

properties.name: height
properties.description: Number of horizontal segments

properties.name: widthSegments
properties.description: Number of vertical segments

properties.name: heightSegments
properties.description: Starting angle for horizontal segments (default 0)

properties.name: phiLength
properties.description: Length of the horizontal segments (default Math.PI * 2)

properties.name: thetaStart
properties.description: Starting angle for vertical segments (default 0)

properties.name: thetaLength
properties.description: Length of the vertical segments (default Math.PI)

properties.name: depthSegments

properties.name: radius
properties.description: Radius of the circle

properties.name: segments
properties.description: Number of segments used to approximate the circle

properties.name: thetaStart
properties.description: Start angle for the first segment

properties.name: thetaLength
properties.description: The central angle of the circular sector

properties.name: radius
properties.description: Radius of the base of the cone

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of the cone

properties.name: radialSegments
properties.description: Number of radial segments around the cone

properties.name: heightSegments
properties.description: Number of segments along the height of the cone

properties.name: openEnded
properties.description: Whether the cone is open-ended or not

properties.description: The central angle of the circular sector

properties.name: detail
properties.description: Level of detail. Higher values create more geometry
